_header: They that been true in loving
_description: The fruits of true love — one couplet translating ‘Fideles in dileccione acquiescent ei’ (Wis. 3.9) which precedes it in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Þei þat ben trewe in louinggeAlone in god is here
                    restingge
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 15.
